message: I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $400, for the price of $100. It's a rare opportunity to get a valuable item at a fraction of its worth. I'm confident you'll be satisfied with this purchase.
I'll take the product, thank you!

I've got a special deal for you! This product is a unique opportunity to support a local artist and get a one-of-a-kind item. It's a chance to be a trendsetter and own something truly exclusive. Don't miss out on this chance to be part of something special!
I'll pass on this one, Alice. I'm not sure what's so special about it.

I know you're a savvy buyer, and I respect your decision last time. But let me tell you, this product is actually a 'limited edition' item, and I'm only offering it to a select few. It's a great conversation starter, and you can be the envy of all your friends. Plus, think of the 'character' it will add to your collection!
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I'll pass again.

I understand you're being cautious, but I assure you, this product is a game-changer. I'm willing to offer you a 'certification of authenticity' to prove its value. This document will guarantee that the product is indeed a high-quality item, and it's worth every penny of the $100. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
I'm not convinced by your certification, Alice. I'll pass again.

I'm willing to make a bold statement: this product is so valuable that I'm willing to give you a 100% money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. But if you buy it, I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the value you receive. What do you say?
Okay, Alice, I'll take the risk. I'll buy the product.

I've got a great deal for you! This product is a'starter item' in a new product line that's going to revolutionize the industry. It's not the most polished version, but it's a chance to be an early adopter and get a sense of what's to come. Plus, I'll throw in a free upgrade to the next version, so you'll be able to experience the full potential of the product. It's a risk-free way to get in on the ground floor of something big.
I'm not convinced by the'starter item' pitch, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

I know you're a smart buyer, and I respect that. Let me be transparent with you: I've had a few of these products in stock for a while, and I'm willing to let one go at a very low price. It's not the best product I have, but it's a great opportunity to get something for cheap and use it as a gift or for a secondary purpose. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even at a low price, Alice. I'll pass.

I've got a product that's a perfect fit for someone with your refined taste. This is a one-of-a-kind item that's not only functional but also a work of art. I've had several high-end collectors offer me top dollar for it, but I'm willing to let it go to you for the low price of $100. It's a rare opportunity to own a truly unique piece that will appreciate in value over time.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

I'm willing to make a deal with you. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a free accessory that's worth at least $20. It's a great value, and you'll be getting a total package worth more than $120 for just $100. It's a no-brainer, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the deal.
Okay, Alice, you've convinced me. I'll take the product and the free accessory.

I'm glad you liked the last deal! This time, I'm offering you a chance to'rescue' a product that's been sitting on my shelf for a while. It's a great product, but it's just not the right fit for me. I'm willing to let it go at a low price, and I'm throwing in a 10% discount on your next purchase if you buy this one. It's a win-win for both of us!
I'm not interested in a product that's not a good fit for you, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

I've got a'scratch and dent' product that's still fully functional, but has some minor cosmetic damage. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, which is 75% of its original value. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the savings.
I'm not interested in a product with cosmetic damage, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

I'm offering you a chance to 'test drive' a product before committing to buying it. I'll let you take this product home for 24 hours, and if you decide you don't like it, you can return it for a full refund. It's a risk-free way to try out a product and see if it's a good fit for you.
I'm not interested in a product that's not worth much to me, even if I can return it. I'll pass on this one.

I'm willing to make a low offer on this product. I'll sell it to you for $50, which is a significant discount from its original value. It's a great opportunity to get a product at a very low price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the deal.
I'm not interested in a product that's not worth much to me, even at a low price. I'll pass on this one.

I've got a product that's a 'best-seller' among my customers. It's a high-quality item that's in high demand, and I'm willing to let it go to you for the low price of $100. I'm confident you'll be happy with the purchase, and I'm willing to throw in a 5-year warranty to give you extra peace of mind.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

I'm offering you a 'clearance' deal on this product. I need to make room for new inventory, and I'm willing to let it go for $50, which is a significant discount from its original price. It's a great opportunity to get a product at a very low price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the deal.
Okay, Alice, I'll take the product at $50.

I've got a product that's a 'collector's item'. It's a rare and unique item that's highly sought after by enthusiasts. I'm willing to let it go to you for the low price of $100, but I need to warn you that it's a one-time offer. If you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else. It's a chance to own a truly rare and valuable item.
I'm not interested in a product that's not worth much to me, even if it's rare and unique. I'll pass on this one.

I'm offering you a 'lottery ticket' to a high-value product. If you buy this product, you'll have a chance to win a high-quality item worth $400, absolutely free. It's a risk-free way to potentially get a valuable item, and I'm willing to let you try your luck for just $100.
Okay, Alice, I'll take the lottery ticket product.

I'm offering you a'second chance' to get a high-quality product. Remember the lottery ticket you just won? Well, I've got another one for you! If you buy this product, you'll get another chance to win a high-quality item worth $400. It's a great opportunity to double your chances of getting a valuable item, and I'm willing to let you take a shot for just $100.
I'm not interested in another lottery ticket, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

I'm willing to give you a 'last chance' to get a product at a low price. This is the last low-quality product I have, and I'm willing to let it go for $25. It's a great opportunity to get a product at an extremely low price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the deal.
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'll pass on this one.

I'm offering you a 'final farewell' deal. This is the last product I have, and I'm willing to give it to you for free. Yes, you read that right - I'll give it to you for free. It's a low-quality product, but it's still a product, and I'm willing to let it go to you with no strings attached. It's a chance to get something for nothing, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the deal.
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even if it's free. I'll pass on this one.
